messages.content: Fixed adapters path in deployToOllama() - was passing outputDir but needs outputDir/adapters subfolder. Updated Swift code to construct correct path.
Created ModelBadge component in ChatView.swift - shows trained models with green color, brain icon, and sparkle. Made ChatView observe OllamaService for real-time model updates.
Created angela:clean model from qwen2.5:3b with proper system prompt. Updated OllamaService model priority: trained > clean > v1.1 > 1b. Added history clearing when model changes.
Training fails but pipeline continues to deployment
Added RuntimeError raise in mlx_lora_trainer.py when subprocess fails - now properly signals failure to Swift so pipeline stops on training error
Training works from terminal but fails from Swift app

Updated UnifiedTrainingService.swift - added PATH environment variable, PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1, changed progress monitoring from stdout parsing to reading progress.json file (more reliable), added ProgressFileData struct
Training still failing with exit code -6 (SIGABRT)
Found config was JSON but mlx_lm expects YAML. Fixed create_lora_config() to write proper YAML format. Also added --grad-checkpoint and reduced --num-layers to 8 for memory efficiency.
Deployment failed: Ollama is not running (but it is running)
Fixed ollama_deployer.py - added _find_ollama() to locate ollama at /usr/local/bin/ollama. Updated all subprocess calls to use full path.
Training failed with exit code 2 - MLX LoRA trainer uses deprecated arguments
Fixed mlx_lora_trainer.py - changed --lora-rank and --lora-layers to new format: --num-layers and -c config file for lora_parameters
